mapper.select: SELECT seq, representativeSns, snsType, sns, addContact_seq From sns WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY seq DESC
SELECT seq, representativeSns, snsType, sns, addContact_seq From sns WHERE 1=1 And seq =#{seq} ORDER BY seq DESC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sns( representativeSns, snsType, sns, addContact_seq ) VALUES( #{representativeSns}, #{snsType}, #{sns}, #{addContact_seq} )
SELECT last_insert_id()
